while hunting.

who was cooking for the first time in his life.

extends the shelf life of fish meat.
Perfect for travelers.

It's a dessert that's simple and popular
by many of the citizens of Archolos.

items.description:

also among the more affluent gourmets.

to make it.

who craves a warm meal.

items.name: Farmer's casserole

be careful not to burn your tongue!

items.name: Bread with meat
items.description:

A thick slice of bread with meat
is a snack that's good in any situation.

items.name: Mushroom Stew
items.description:

A delicious, aromatic stew made of mushrooms.
However, beware of poisonous specimens that
could escape picker's attention...

No one's been found yet,
...who'd ever despise a piece of this baked good.

what leftovers were used to make this pвtй,
but anyone who's hungry will eat it with relish.

over a pint of beer in the coastal taverns.

items.name: Old Bread Soup

that can be found in the pantries of the poor.

Roast lamb with vegetables and wine
...it's a dish that's a little cheesy, but tasty.

who wants to gain strength in the morning.

items.name: Fish in beer batter

Suitable for taking on the travel.

its huge content of nutritious fat,
in which we like to dip stale bread.

items.name: Smoked Herb Fish

items.name: Meat packs

items.name: Silver chest
items.description:
Silver chest

There's something heavy inside.

items.name: A mysterious leather bellow
items.description:
A mysterious leather bellow

There are a few coins dangling in the middle,
but that's not the only thing in there.

items.name: A bloody hand
items.description:
A bloody hand

A human hand removed from the belly of a swampshark.
It seems to be holding something inside.

items.name: Big bag of gold
items.description:
Big bag of gold

You can hear a lot of coins inside.

items.name: Antique goblet
items.description:
Antique goblet
A cup from a forgotten era. It's clean, but
smells weird. Must have been dug up recently.
Many jewelers and collectors will pay a fortune,
to even touch it.

items.name: Metal cup
items.description:
Metal cup

A sloppily made mug.
Strange, but it smells just like
a precious goblet from the swamp.

items.name: Leather bellow
items.description:
Leather bellow

The heavy leather bellows Helga handed me.
My uncle left it for me before he disappeared.

items.name: Suspicious golden Innos statuette
items.description:
Suspicious golden Innos statuette

A suspicious looking figurine of the golden Innos.
It looks like it's going to break under light pressure.

items.name: Suspicious silver Innos statuette
items.description:
Suspicious silver Innos statuette

A suspicious looking figurine of the silver Innos.
It looks like it's going to break under light pressure.

items.name: Suspicious bronze Innos statuette
items.description:
Suspicious bronze Innos statuette

A suspicious looking figurine of a bronze Innos.
It looks like it's going to break under light pressure.
